name: Nella mente del genio
description:
'Nella mente del genio’ is a virtual reality application that aims to immerse the user in the life and studies of Leonardo da Vinci. Through the application it will be possible to discover many of the works created by the scientist and artist. The purpose of the application is essentially educational: it will be possible to study objects, interact with them and observe how they work.

Interact with Arturo, Leonardo’s assistant, and help him find all the pieces to bring to life Leonardo’s works. Follow the clues and use them to achieve the final goal. 

 Will you accept the challenge?
